code: import{useState}from'react';import s from'./AdminMailListFormSection.module.css';import Loader from'../../../components/UI/Loader/Loader';import{sendTestMail}from'../../../api/mailingApi';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AdminMailListFormSection=()=>{let[isEmails,setEmails]=useState('');let[isLoading,setLoading]=useState(false);const fetchingMailingTest=async()=>{setLoading(true);let result=await sendTestMail(isEmails);if(result.status){setLoading(false);setEmails('');}};const onClickSubmitBtnHandler=e=>{e.preventDefault();isEmails&&fetchingMailingTest();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"section-container",style:{width:'100%',maxWidth:'540px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"\u0412\u0456\u0434\u043F\u0440\u0430\u0432\u0438\u0442\u0438 \u0442\u0435\u0441\u0442\u043E\u0432\u0443 \u0440\u043E\u0437\u0441\u0438\u043B\u043A\u0443"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:s.form,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:s.input_block,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{htmlFor:"",children:["Emails \u043E\u0434\u0435\u0440\u0436\u0443\u0432\u0430\u0447\u0456\u0432 (\u0447\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0437 \u043A\u043E\u043C\u0443):",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{title:"\u041E\u0431\u043E\u0432`\u044F\u0437\u043A\u043E\u0432\u0435",style:{fontSize:'20px',color:'red'},children:"*"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:isEmails,onChange:e=>setEmails(e.target.value),placeholder:"Email, email..."})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:s.input_block,children:isLoading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Loader,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"standart-btn",onClick:onClickSubmitBtnHandler,children:"\u0412\u0456\u0434\u043F\u0440\u0430\u0432\u0438\u0442\u0438"})})]})]});};export default AdminMailListFormSection;
